string.value: #b#p9270030##k is about to reveal more about his secrets! Let's go find him Boat Quay.

The most strongest ghost, #b#o9420512##k is the one that #p9270030# was so afraid of... Well I am not afraid of anything! He asked me to help him get back to the sea by eliminating #b300 #o9420512##k. He told me to bring my friends with me since this ghost is the most powerful one in town. Follow me my fellow Maplers!\n\n#o9420512# #r#a45121##k
Eliminating #o9420512# was not a easy task for me but I did it! Now, I should go see #p9270030# and see if he has left to the sea. Or.. does he have another serious secret, something Big?

So here you are again Mapler. I guess you are brave enough to deal with the ghost and not run away from them like me. But, are you sure you want to hear more about my secret? Be sure in your decision.

The ghosts that you have dealt with before are jokes. This is the strongest ghost in the boat and I am not sure if I want to go back to sea with them looking at me. Those furious eyes give me the chills! The #b#o9420512##k surely are the strongest ghost of them all and we need to get rid of them to go out to sea again.

Please go find #b#o9420512##k and eliminate 300 of them for me. Watch out! he will look at you with his furious eyes exactly the same way he looked at me. Oh my god...I am already scared. Please take your friends with you...Please.
Haha.... I can tell that you are scared to find out what's next...
The Ghosts in Ghost Ship caused me to lose my job!
You are a superman!! Thank you so much for the help! I shall make my preparation to re-sail into my lovely old sea once again. Don't be shy... Now take this~
This #bWhite Essence#k is made from the energy you brought by defeating Mr. Anchor... I hope this White Essence could help you reveal the real secret of the ghost ship.
Nah.... I don't think you have eliminate 300 Mr. Anchors.
